review.description:
I can only review the falafel
Excellent sandwich for $5
Always fresh and friendly
As the pictures show you it is a food cart
Gyros hamburgers rice etc are available for sale
review.author: Jonathan R.

review.description: DUMBO is such a mecca for interesting and unique food carts & food trucks, but I was in a hurry this day and didn't have time to scout around for other quick lunch solutions... so, it was street meet for me! On this visit, I ordered the chicken over rice, which was typical--grilled mushy chicken pieces served over yellow saffron rice with a salad. The flavor of the food was fine, but the portion size was a little small compared to other Halal carts I've visited. Lesson Learned: If you're in DUMBO, don't pursue Halal... pursue something a little more unique... b/c it's available if you've got the time to peruse Front Street, Pearl Street, and some of the other side streets nearby.
review.author: Scott B.

review.description:
Same two guys. But they tweaked the recipe. I finally ordered my usual lamb and rice from them again after a long hiatus. Frankly, I wasn't planning on eating their food again, but fate intervened today. 

So... 4 stars. Cheap ( though they raised prices by $1) and now not bad at all. Worthy of a spot on my lunch rotation on days when I'm feeling poor.
review.author: Ming O.
